full_summary:
## TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT
### Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### **VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE**

The Directorate Maritime Procurement on behalf of the Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of **VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE** products.
Delivery is required to **CFB Esquimalt** and **CFB Halifax**.

**Delivery Requirements:**

*   Item 1 (10 units): VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE with NSN: 21-910-9691, Part No.: 8611539, NCAGE: 81576
*   Item 2 (7 units): VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE with NSN: 21-910-9691, Part No.: 8611539, NCAGE: 81576
*   Item 3 (7 units): VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE with NSN: 21-910-9693, Part No.: 8611540, NCAGE: 81576
*   Item 4 (6 units): VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE with NSN: 21-910-9693, Part No.: 8611540, NCAGE: 81576

**Bid Submission Requirements:**

* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must provide the brand name, model, and/or Part Number, and their NCAGE.
* Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Bids in foreign currency will be rejected by the Crown.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Supporting Documents:**

The complete tender notice along with the respective RFP package (in English and French) are available at [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4944/rfp-w8482-231349-a-en.pdf) and [CanadaBuys (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4944/rfp-w8482-231349-a-fr_1.pdf).

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Jean-Pierre Normandin
* Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (819) 939-3674
